name: part_003
file: tmp_【新3Dお披露目】周防パトラ生誕祭！ゲスト FUWAMOCO＆豪華ビデオレター！重大告知あり！Birthday Party 2025【周防パトラ】 [bubs05N-m04]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Suou Patra performs a high-energy song with 3D choreography on stage.
A special announcement segment for Suou Patra's Birthday 2025 goods and voices.
Suou Patra performs an electric guitar medley featuring classic video game themes.

subtitles.english: Unbelievable

subtitles.original: いつの世も過去も未来も今にあるんだ

subtitles.original: 生きていることを愚直に果たそうよ
